data: “Stranger than the tales of the Arabian Nights—indeed, almost Munchausen-like in its seemingly improbable character is the tale I am about to give you in truth,” said Captain Nicodemus Beere as he hitched up his trowsers and shifted his quid.
The Transient Lake; or, Frank Reade, Jr.'s Adventures in a Mysterious Country
